tool_description: Generates cohesive color palettes for mobile app interfaces, ensuring accessibility compliance and brand alignment.

brand_color.description: Primary brand color in hex format (e.g., #FF5722)

color_scheme.description: Color scheme type: monochromatic, complementary, analogous, triadic, or tetradic

accessibility_level.description: WCAG accessibility level: AA or AAA

error_messages: Invalid hex color: Provide brand_color in valid hex format (e.g., #FF5722)
Invalid color scheme: Use monochromatic, complementary, analogous, triadic, or tetradic
Invalid accessibility level: Use AA or AAA
usage: Input brand_color and color_scheme; optionally set accessibility_level to generate a complete color palette with primary, secondary, accent, and neutral colors.

primary_colors.description: Primary color variations in hex format

accent_colors.description: Accent colors for highlights and CTAs

neutral_colors.description: Neutral colors for backgrounds and text

accessibility_scores.description: WCAG contrast ratios for color combinations
